para_one: Welcome to Hackerstellar, a 24-Hour Offline Coding Hackathon where innovation and imagination come to life. Join us to explore the limitless potential of technology under the theme of Space Exploration. Hosted by the Computer Society of India at K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering.
para_two: At Hackerstellar, Network with like-minded individuals, Demonstrate your abilities and Develop cutting-edge and Learn. With great prizes, including Cash Prizes, Vouchers, and Internship opportunities, and Industry Experts as judges, this is an event not to be missed. Complimentory Food, Fun Activities and what not! Register on Devfolio now to be a part of this unforgettable event and be a part of the future of technology and space exploration.
